content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a command to browse the website https://www.wikihow.com/Have-Fun-on-the-Internet. Your computer returned that the website provides multiple lists of fun things to do on the internet, including playing games, exploring digital content, learning new skills, listening to music and podcasts, and more. The website also includes tips on staying safe while enjoying these activities and links to various websites and resources for entertainment and language learning. Additionally, the website mentions the health benefits of coloring.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.wikihow.com/Have-Fun-on-the-Internet", "question": "What is a summary of the website?"}}}'}]
"""
